TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 灰脉薹草 ( 原变种) hui mai tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

place_of_publication.publication_title: in Traut vetter & C. A. Meyer, Fl. Ochot. Phaenog.

treatment.description: Female glumes 1.6–2 mm. Utricles elliptic, 2.2–3 mm.
treatment.distribution: Moist places, marshes; ca. 600 m. Heilongjiang, Jilin, Nei Mongol [Korea, Russia (Far East, E Siberia)].
